content.question: In The Communist Manifesto (1848), Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels asserted that

choices.label: technology was evil and would bring more suffering than benefits to the working class
capitalism was a necessary stage of economic and social development
a socialist revolution was most likely to occur in Russia
the goals of nationalism and socialism were inseparable
the working class was so oppressed that it was unable to help itself

content.answer: capitalism was a necessary stage of economic and social development
